Wings: A full pound of hand breaded chicken wings served with korean bbq, buffalo, smoky sweet dry rub, bbq or spicy honey garlic sauce

Fried Pickles: sour and crispy, served with buttermilk ranch
Rings of Fire: dry rub seasonsed onion rings, served with spicy maple dipping sauce
Irish Nachos: house fried potato chips, cheddar, bacon, fresh scallions, jalapenos and sour cream
GoGo Bites: deep fried bites filled with jalapenos, roasted corn, bacon & cream cheese, deep fried and served with BBQ drizzle
Pemi Dip: creamy bacon dip w/ a 3 cheese blend, whole grain mustard, caramelized onion and scallions served w/warm soft pretzel bites

Bowl of Chili: served with cheddar and green onion
Roasted Tomato & Burrata Caprese: slow roasted cherry tomatoes, creamy burrata, garlic infused olive oil, balsamic reduction, fresh basil, toasted brioche
Roasted Mushroom and Goat Cheese Salad: arugula tossed in balsamic vinaigrette, roasted mushrooms, pickled red onions, cherry tomatoes, herbed goat cheese
Caesar Salad: romaine, creamy caesar dressing, herb croutons

Public House: mozzarella, pesto, feta, sliced tomatoes, roasted garlic, salami
Roasted Mushroom & Goat Cheese Flatbread: roasted garlic puree, cremini mushrooms, herbed goat cheese topped with balsamic arugula salad
Meat Flatbread: red sauce, mozzarella, pepperoni, salami, bacon
BLT Flatbread: pemi dip base, bacon, tomatoes, romaine lettuce, spicy mayo drizzle
BBQ Chicken Flatbread: ranch, shredded chicken, mozzarella, cheddar, bacon, bbq, onions

subtitle: Served w/house potato chips and a pickle.  Substitute hand cut fries or side caesar salad for $2, truffle fries for $2.50. Add a side caesar salad or a cup of chili to any Sandwich for $3. Substitute a gluten free roll to any sandwich for $2

Banh Mi: slow roasted pork, pickled carrots, thin sliced cucumbers, jalapenos & fresh cilantro w/ spicy mayo, served on toasted french roll

subtitle: Add a side caesar salad or a cup of chili to any meal for $3

Caprese Chicken: grilled chicken topped with burrata, roasted cherry tomatoes, fresh basil, garlic infused olive oil, balsamic reduction.  Served w/veg of the day & roasted fingerling potatoes.
Baked Mac & Cheese: cavatappi pasta in three cheese sauce topped with buttered ritz crumbs.
